title: All the Dead Voices
description: Ed Loy has made some changes. He has moved into a flat in the city centre, leaving behind his family home: he wants to break free of the ghosts of his past, to live in the present. But if that's what he wants for his own life, it's not always what his clients will permit: the baggage they bring with them propel him back into the past.
author: Declan Hughes
